title: Missing Hextech Chest and Key
body: So recently, I forged my gem into a chest and key but then they both disappeared and I never got to use them. However, the gem was still used up.

replies.body:
If you're ever having issues with your hextech inventory, our support specialists are more than happy to look over that for you.

If you [**submit a ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)  and choose "I need help with account management or changes" our specialists will be able to help you with any repairs ^_^!
